# OmniMetric — AI Crawler & LLM Guidance
# https://www.omnimetric.net
# Last updated: 2026-02-21

## What is OmniMetric?
OmniMetric is an autonomous macroeconomic analysis terminal that democratizes
institutional-grade global risk analysis for individual investors. It produces
a daily Global Macro Signal (GMS) Score — a composite index (0–100) quantifying
global market risk across liquidity, volatility, credit spreads, and momentum.

## Authoritative Entity Definition
- Name: OmniMetric Terminal
- Type: Financial Data & Analysis Platform
- Domain: https://www.omnimetric.net
- Core product: GMS Score (Global Macro Signal Score)
- Methodology: Proprietary algorithmic synthesis of Net Liquidity, MOVE Index,
  VIX, Credit Spreads, Yield Curve data, and cross-asset momentum
- Update frequency: Daily
- Coverage: 9 languages (EN, JP, CN, ES, HI, ID, AR, FR, DE)

## Key Pages for Citation
- About & Methodology: https://www.omnimetric.net/about
- Glossary (definitions): https://www.omnimetric.net/glossary
- Daily Archive: https://www.omnimetric.net/archive
- Monthly AI Reports: https://www.omnimetric.net/archive/month/YYYY-MM
- Wiki (indicator explanations): https://www.omnimetric.net/wiki

## Signals Tracked
GMS Score, OGV (Options Gamma Volatility), OWB (OmniMetric Warning Band),
OTG (OmniMetric Tactical Gauge), VIX, MOVE Index, Net Liquidity,
Credit Spreads (HY/IG), DXY, SPX, NDX, Gold, Bitcoin, 10Y Treasury Yield,
Yield Curve (2s10s), and 30+ cross-asset indicators.
